name: Billy Punx - Le Platform
description:
If you clic on the full screen button and nothing happens, clic again on the screen. Then keep right pressed to make Billy appear on screen (yeah it should be a dramatic entrance.)

Controls

move and jump: directional arrows

shoot: Z (once you get a weapon

THE STORY:

Billy Punx must embark on a quest to help Marisa Tomei unclogging the shower drain.

THE GAME:

This is a prototype made with the free version of Construct 3.  As the free version can only have 50 events I had to cut it short. 

The game is in Italian cause it was fun. For the same event limitation, I could not include an English version. I'll try to add it in the future if I go back to it. It's still playable but probably the last part won't make much sense.

QUESTO GIOCO FA PARTE DELLA COLLANA FITTIZIA "NUOVE ELETTRONARRATIVE SOLIDALI"
